articles.name: Message Forwarding
articles.title: Message Forwarding
articles.body:
What this article covers: 

  • What is message forwarding?
  • How to Forward a Message 
    • Desktop/Browser
    • Mobile
  • Frequently Asked Questions

What is message forwarding?

This is currently an experiment on iOS, Android, and desktop and is not available to everyone.

Have you ever wanted to send your friends that cool thing you saw on another server or send them a funny meme from another channel?

Forwarding will let you to select any message or piece of media and send it to another place in Discord. 

A forwarded message will show up clearly labeled as "forwarded" with only the content of the message included.

How to Forward a Message

Desktop/Browser

1. To get started, hover over to a message and press the Forward button [] within the hover bar in the upper right corner of the message.  

Others may see the forward button next to media and embeds. Using this option will only forward the media or embed, not the entire message. To forward the entire message, navigate to the desktop/browser app and either:
- Open the context menu by right-clicking the message and selecting Forward.
- Hover over the message and select the Forward button in the hover bar.

2. The Forward To pop-up menu will appear, and you can select where you would like to forward the message. 

Note: You can forward the message to a maximum of 5 places.

3. Once you’re all set, press Send in the lower right corner of the pop-up menu to forward your message. 

Your forwarded messages will be labeled as “Forwarded” without any indication of the message’s original author. The original message's source destination will only show as a link to those who already have access to that server or if the server is public. 

Mobile

1. On your mobile device, tap the Forward button [] to the right of the message.  

2. The Forward To menu will appear, allowing you to select where you would like to forward your message. Once you’re ready, tap Send. 

3. Your message will be forwarded to the selected places and be labeled as Forwarded. 

Frequently Asked Questions 

Q: Why can’t I see the option to forward a message?

A: Message forwarding is currently an experiment and is available to a limited number of users.

Q: Why can’t I forward certain messages? 

A: Messages from monetized channels cannot be forwarded as well as messages from  age-restricted channels to unrestricted channels. 

Q: Can I publish a forwarded message in an announcement channel? 

A: No, publishing a forwarded message in announcement channels is not allowed at this time. 

Q: Will others see who originally wrote the message I forward? 

A: No, the original author of the message will not be shown: only the content is included. .

Q: Can everyone see where a forwarded message came from? 

A: No, the link back to the original message is only visible to those who have access to the original server and channel, or if it’s from a public server. 

Q: If the  original message is edited later, will my forwarded message update too? 

A: No, the forwarded message is a copy of the original message at the time you forwarded it and will not update. 

Q: Can I add my own text along with the forwarded message? 

A: No, this option is not available at this time. 

Q: Can I disable forwarding for my own messages or for messages in/out of my server? 

A: No, you cannot control this at this time.

articles.name: [Resolved] Partially dropping Xbox statuses
articles.title: [Resolved] Partially dropping Xbox statuses
articles.body:
Update as of July 01, 2024 (06:07PST):
This outage is now resolved. Here's a link to our status page for more Information: https://discordstatus.com/

As of July 1, 2024, we identified that roughly 1/3rd of Xbox statuses are being dropped. Our team is currently investigating and are working on a fix.

articles.name: Zenless Zone Zero Quest
articles.title: Zenless Zone Zero Quest
articles.body:
What this article covers: 

  • Promotion Terms
  • How to Complete the Quest
  • Redemption Instructions
  • Frequently Asked Questions

Promotion Terms

Quest Game: Zenless Zone Zero
Quest Name: V1.0 Quest

Offer Details: Stream 15 minutes of Zenless Zone Zero to receive a Version 1.0 bundle. This bundle will include the following items: 

  • Denny ×12,000
  • Senior Investigator Log ×3
  • W-Engine Energy Module ×2
  • Bangboo System Widget ×1

NOTE: Polychrome rewards are limited to 300,000 recipients. Only the first 300,000 Proxies to complete the Quest will receive the reward. The time of completion will be determined based on when the bundle code is redeemed after completing the livestream quest. First come, first served.

Who is Eligible: Available to Zenless Zone Zero players on desktop and via Discord, either through  browser or the desktop app.

Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you’re unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for this Quest or reward.

Availability Period: The V1.0 Quest can be accepted on Discord from July 8, 2024 until July 15, 2024 (5:00pm PST). The Version 1.0 bundle needs to be redeemed by August 14, 2024 (3:00am PST).

Quest requirements must be completed during this period to receive the reward. 

Other Terms: 

Limit of one reward redemption per Discord account. 

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center. 

How to Complete the Quest

Once you have accepted the Quest, you must stream the game through the Discord desktop app and have at least one friend actively watching the stream to complete the Quest requirement.

In order to successfully complete the Zenless Zone Zero Quest, players who meet the eligibility criteria must live stream their Zenless Zone Zero gameplay to a friend via a Discord voice channel for a minimum duration of 15 minutes on the desktop app. 

1. Before you can begin the Quest, you must launch the game first.

2. Head to your Discord desktop app and navigate to a direct message (DM), group chat, or a server of your choice.

3. Start a voice call or join a voice channel and select the Screen Share [] icon located in the voice status panel. Be sure to select the individual application for the game before you Go Live. 

NOTE: You must select the game application to stream! Streaming your device’s screen will not progress your Quest forward. Once you stream, you can check the progress bar on the Gift inventory to ensure progress is being made on the Quest.

4. When you’re ready to stream your gameplay, press Go Live. You can learn more about streaming your game here. 

Redemption Instructions

1. Once you have completed the Quest by streaming 15 minutes of Zenless Zone Zero using Go Live on Discord, you will receive a Gift Code in your Discord Gift Inventory. You can learn more about Go Live and screen sharing here.

2. Then, visit the official  website's code redemption page and log in to your game account. 

3. Enter the redemption code and you'll receive the bundle via in-game mail.  

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is there a limit on how many Quests I can redeem on my Discord account?

A: Eligible users can redeem one of each of the available Quest campaigns on their Discord account. 

For more information on Discord Quests and to view the currently active quests, visit our Discord Quest Help Center.

Q: Is this feature/promotion available in my region?

A: Some Quests will not be available in all regions based on terms and conditions. If you’re in an ineligible region for a Quest, you will not be able to complete it.
Additionally, Discord’s premium services are restricted in some regions. If you're unable to access the Gift Inventory, you are not eligible for Quests.

Q: Why am I unable to see Quests on the Discord mobile app?

A: This feature is only available on the desktop and browser app.

Q: I have concerns or questions regarding privacy and Quests. 

A: ​​We encourage you to review Discord’s Privacy Policy for further details about how we use your information. You can head over to our Data Used for In-Game Rewards article, to learn more about how we use data for Quests. 

Q: Why am I unable to complete Quest while using Linux?

A: Currently, Quest rewards are unable to be earned on Linux devices. 

However, our team is looking into a resolution for this issue so that earning Quest rewards is possible on Linux in the future. For now, we recommend completing the requirement on a different operating system, like Windows or MacOS. 

Our support team does not have an exact ETA for when a solution will be available, and won't be able to provide any status updates on this specific issue.

Q: I no longer see a Quest. Where did it go?

A: Quests are typically only available for a limited amount of time. If you no longer see a Quest in the Gift Inventory or in-app notifications about the quest, the period to complete and claim the reward for the Quest is over.

articles.name: 1 Month of Nitro for SteelSeries GG Account Holders
articles.title: 1 Month of Nitro for SteelSeries GG Account Holders
articles.body:
Starting from July 1, 2024 (10AM PST) to October 31, 2024 (11:59PM PST), SteelSeries GG users can claim 1  month of Discord Nitro. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

We will not be able to refund any leftover membership time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing membership when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through your SteelSeries GG account by July 1, 2024 (10AM PST), and redeem in your Discord account by October 31, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Membership: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro membership will convert to a monthly recurring membership, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is SteelSeries?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my SteelSeries GG account?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • How do I Share my Code with a Friend?
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Membership Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is SteelSeries?

SteelSeries offers gaming peripherals and accessories, including headsets, keyboards, mice, controllers, and mousepads. You can learn more about SteelSeries on their website here.

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my SteelSeries GG Account?

1. Head to https://steelseries.com/gg/discord-nitro and install GG. If you don’t already have a SteelSeries account, please create one.

2. Verify your email address if you have not already done so.

3. Next, tap on the Giveaways tab

4. Copy and paste the redemption URL for your 1 month of Discord Nitro and then follow the steps below.

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by November 30, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro membership on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

NOTE:

- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.

- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo link on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo link.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copying and Pasting into your Browser Window

  • Start by directly pressing the promotion link or copying and pasting the promotion link into your browser window.

Note: If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

  • Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.
    • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 
  • If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)
  • When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button. 

Note:

- If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Subscription Now Activated

  • After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro subscription on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

How do I Share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you press on and open the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion URL link in the new page and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by November 30th, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Membership Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: SteelSeries GG users can claim Discord Nitro promo between July 1, 2024 (10AM PST) to October 31, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

After November 30th, 2024 (time end), SteelSeries GG users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by November 30th, 2024 (11:59PM PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by November 30th, 2024 (11:59PM PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion from their SteelSeries GG account?

A: Users must have SteelSeries GG client installed or download to access the offer.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro membership on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro membership and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost membership? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Payment Info and Membership Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a membership plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro membership at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a trial promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is a trial, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro membership so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "This gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been claimed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

Unfortunately, once the promo has been claimed, the promo cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the promo is invalid.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if you are given an invalid promo and we will not be able to provide a new promo.

Q: I see a “Looks like something went wrong” error.

A: There are several reasons why you may be seeing this error:

  • You are ineligible for this promotion
  • The promotion is invalid
  • The promotion has reached the maximum number of claims
  • The link is invalid

Please note that the Discord support team is not able to assist if you run into this error when attempting to redeem. See the list above for possible reasons why your account may be ineligible or otherwise unable to redeem this promotion.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the link is invalid. If you've copy and pasted this link, we recommend you double check the link you were given once more and make sure it exactly matches the link in your SteelSeries account.

If you received this link from a friend, double check with your friend on the exact link to make sure that it matches the link in their SteelSeries account.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if your friend has given an invalid link and we will not be able to provide a new link.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: I’m having trouble with my SteelSeries GG account!

A: Reach out to SteelSeries’ support team here: https://support.steelseries.com/hc/en-us

articles.name: 2-Month Free Trial of Super Duolingo for Discord Nitro Members
articles.title: 2-Month Free Trial of Super Duolingo for Discord Nitro Members
articles.body:
Starting from July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST) to August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST), Discord Nitro members can claim 2 months of Super Duolingo. Read more about the promotion below.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 2-month free trial of Super Duolingo for Discord Nitro member

Who is Eligible: To claim through Discord, you must be a current Nitro member or a current Nitro trial user. 

Requirements:

Claim through Discord Gift Inventory from July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST) to August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST), and redeem in your Duolingo account by August 8, 2024 (5:00pm PST).

Subscription:

After the 2-month trial period, your Super Duolingo subscription will convert to the plan selected upon starting your trial, and Duolingo will bill your payment method unless you cancel the subscription 24 hours before the end of the 2-month trial.

What this article covers: 

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Duolingo? 
  • How do I claim the Super Duolingo trial in Discord? 
    • Eligibility for Claiming this Promotion in Discord
    • Step By Step Claim Instructions 
  • How do I redeem the Super Duolingo trial on my Duolingo Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Super Duolingo
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Claiming and Redemption Process
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Duolingo?

Duolingo is a fun, free app for learning 40+ languages, math, and music through quick, bite-sized lessons. Super Duolingo is the fastest, most fun and effective way to learn a language; subscribers can fast track their progress with no ads, no interruptions, and features to help them learn at their own pace. 

How do I claim the Super Duolingo trial in Discord?

As long as you're a Discord Nitro member, you'll be able to claim the Super Duolingo code in the Gift Inventory from July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST) to August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).

Eligibility for the Claiming this Promotion in Discord

In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active member to Discord Nitro. This applies to monthly or yearly Nitro members, as well as Nitro trial users).

  • If you are an active Discord Nitro member, the code must be claimed in the Gift Inventory by August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).
    • Otherwise, the code will not be available to claim after August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST). 

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting member, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

Step By Step Claim Instructions 

1) Log into Your Discord account and head to the Gift Inventory tab. 

If you’re subscribed to Discord Nitro, start by logging into your Discord account. 

You may notice a notification bar at the top of your browser/desktop app, and you can press the "Take me there" button in the notification bar to be redirected to your Gift Inventory. 

For both the desktop/browser app and mobile app, you can also directly head to your User Settings, and then select Gift Inventory.

2) Click on the Claim button for the Super Duolingo Gift.

Once you press Claim on the Super Duolingo Gift in the Gift Inventory and you'll then see a new pop-up with your 12 character code for this promotion.

If you want to redeem your code later, you can press the Maybe Later button, and then redeem the code before August 8, 2024 (5:00pm PST).

3) Complete the claim offer step on the Duolingo x Discord landing page.

After receiving your unique gift code, you will be redirected to the Duolingo x Discord landing page. Then, select Claim Offer. 

If you’re not redirected to the landing page, you can redeem your unique code on duolingo.com/redeem. 

4) Create or log in to your free Duolingo account.

Then, you can log in to your free Duolingo account. If you do not already have a Duolingo account, you can create an account by selecting Create Account. 

4) Review how your free trial works, select your plan, and complete the billing information page. 

Once you’ve logged into your free Duolingo account, you will be asked to review the free trial, select a plan for after your free trial, and complete your billing information. 

NOTE: If you’re a current Super or Duolingo Max subscriber, you will not be eligible for this promotion.

5) Super Duolingo trial is now activated!

After you have completed the steps above, your Super Duolingo trial will be activated and you can continue your learning journey.

How do I redeem the Super Duolingo Trial on my Duolingo Account?

Once you have claimed the code in the Gift Inventory, you'll now need to officially redeem this code with an eligible Duolingo account.

Eligibility for Redeeming the Super Duolingo Trial

You are eligible for this promotion if:

  • You are a new or existing free Duolingo learner. Current Super or Duolingo Max subscribers are not eligible. 
  • You have redeemed the Duolingo x Discord offer through the landing page or by redeeming your unique code on duolingo.com/redeem. 
  • You have completed the Duolingo account sign-up and added your billing information.

NOTE: The Super Duolingo subscription will automatically renew at the current local price at the end of the free trial, unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the 2-month trial. 
Offer may not be combined with any other coupons, discounts, or promotions. Offer has no cash value. Offer cannot be sold or otherwise transferred. Void where prohibited by law. Users are subject to the Terms and Conditions of Service at www.duolingo.com/terms, which Duolingo may modify at its sole discretion.

If you're running into any issues when attempting to redeem this promotion, and you believe that your Duolingo account meets the promotion requirements, reach out to Duolingo’s support team for further assistance. You can do so by emailing super-support@duolingo.com with the subject line: “Nitro x Duolingo claim Super Duolingo offer code”. 

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Claiming and Redemption Process
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion for Nitro members run for?

A: This promotion runs from July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST) to August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).

After August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST), Nitro members will no longer be able to claim a trial code.

Q: How long does my Super Duolingo free trial code last for in my Gift Inventory?

A: Once a code is claimed in the Gift Inventory in Discord, all Super Duolingo trial codes must be redeemed by August 8, 2024, 2024 (5:00pm PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Duolingo account by August 8, 2024 (5:00pm PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to claim 2 months of Super Duolingo.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion in the Discord Gift Inventory?

A: All current and new Nitro members are eligible for this perk. 

This does not include Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boost-only members.

Q: Who can redeem this Super Duolingo trial to their Duolingo account?

A: This offer is only valid for free Duolingo learners and must be redeemed through the Duolingo x Discord landing page or by redeeming your unique code on duolingo.com/redeem. 

Current Super or Duolingo Max subscribers are not eligible. Additional eligibility criteria can be found here.

Q: Can I redeem the Super Duolingo promotion to my Duolingo account in my region? 

A: Eligible Discord Nitro members will receive a Super Duolingo free trial code within Discord. Once you have received this, you can redeem the code through the web browser as long as you meet the eligibility criteria.

Claiming and Redemption Process

Q: On which Discord platforms can I claim this promotion?

A: You'll be able to claim the promo on the mobile, browser and desktop version of the Discord app. 

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem the Super Duolingo trial?

A: Because Super Duolingo is a subscription plan, at the end of your 2 month trial, your first billing cycle starts so you can continue to enjoy Super Duolingo.

However, you can cancel the Super Duolingo subscription 24 hours before the end of the 2-month trial. You can read more about how to cancel here.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I don't see the Super Duolingo code in my Discord Gift Inventory? 

A: In order to claim this code, you'll need to be an active member to Discord Nitro and you can be either a monthly or yearly Nitro member.

Unfortunately, if you are a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting member, you'll need to subscribe to Nitro in order to claim this promotion.

If you are an active Discord Nitro member, make sure to refresh your Discord client to double check if an update was needed.

  • What if I'm still running into issues? 
    • If the refresh does not work, please submit a ticket through our support system at: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.
    • Be sure to submit the ticket using the email address associated with your Discord account, and send us a screenshot of the following: 
      1. Your My Account tab
      2. Your Gift Inventory tab

Q: I'm having trouble redeeming this promotion to my Duolingo account. How do I contact Duolingo support? 

A: If you have claimed your code through the Gift Inventory and are having issues redeeming this promotion, you can reach out to Duolingo’s support at: super-support@duolingo.com with the subject line: “Nitro x Duolingo claim Super Duolingo offer code”.

articles.name: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Free Duolingo Learners in the US
articles.title: 1 Month of Discord Nitro for Free Duolingo Learners in the US
articles.body:
Starting from July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST) to August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST), free Duolingo learners can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month trial of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

We will not be able to refund any leftover membership time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing membership when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Free Duolingo learners in the United States, who are learning from English, are eligible to receive a Partner Offer card containing their unique 1 month trial of Discord Nitro. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through the Duolingo iOS or Android mobile app by July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST), and redeem in your Discord account by September 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).

Membership: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro membership will convert to a monthly recurring membership, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings. 

What this article covers:

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • What is Duolingo?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my free Duolingo account?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Subscriber? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Membership Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

What is Duolingo?

Duolingo is a fun, free app for learning 40+ languages, math, and music through quick, bite-sized lessons. Super Duolingo is the fastest, most fun and effective way to learn a language; subscribers can fast track their progress with no ads, no interruptions, and features to help them learn at their own pace. 

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Free Duolingo account?

NOTE: This promotion is only available to free Duolingo learners in the United States, who are learning from English to another language.

In order to claim this Nitro promo, you must have an active, free Duolingo account and be learning from English to one of the 30+ languages available in the US. 

If you are eligible for this promotion, you will be presented with a Partner Offer card once you have completed a lesson on your learning path.

Partner Offer Card

Duolingo Learning Path

NOTE: You may need to complete a few lessons depending on the age of your account before being presented with the Partner Offer card. 

Once you are presented with the Discord Nitro offer, select Claim Offer to receive your unique code for a 1 month trial of Discord Nitro. 

If you encounter any issues while attempting to claim the Discord Nitro offer, please reach out to Duolingo’s support team for assistance. You can do this by emailing super-support@duolingo.com with the subject line: “Nitro x Duolingo claim partner offer code”. 

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo on your Discord account. You must redeem this Nitro trial by September 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

Free Duolingo learners in the United States, who are learning from English, are eligible for this promotion.
If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro membership on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

Step 1 - Claim your code via Duolingo’s Partner Offer Card

  • Be sure to claim the Discord Nitro promo from the Duolingo Partner Offer card. You can find steps on how to claim this promo here. 

NOTE:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

  •  Once you have claimed your code, navigate to Discord. If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 3 - Claiming your promotion gift

Once you have logged in to your Discord account, you will see a message asking you to claim your promotion gift. 

The account you are currently logged in as will receive this gift. This gift cannot be shared with a friend and once claimed, the gift cannot be switched to a different user, so be sure you are on the account you want to claim the gift for. If you want to change to a different account, press on the Switch Accounts.

Press on Next when you’re ready to redeem your gift on your chosen account.

Step 4 - Redeeming your promotion gift

Review the details of the promotion then press on Next. Please note: if you switch to a different account at this step, you will not be able to claim and redeem the promotion on the account you switched to. 

Make sure your payment information is accurate. If your Discord account does not have your payment information, please fill out your payment details. You will not be charged until the trial ends and the membership renews.

When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the confirmation button.

Step 5 - Membership Now Activated

After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro membership on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Membership Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Eligible Duolingo users can claim Discord Nitro promo between July 2, 2024 (10:00am PST) to August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).

After August 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST), eligible Duolingo users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by September 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by September 1, 2024 (11:59pm PST), it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion from their Duolingo account?

A: Eligible Duolingo learners in the United States, who have a free Duolingo account and are learning from English, can claim this promotion once they complete a lesson on the learning path. 

NOTE: A few lessons may need to be completed during the promotion period before being presented with the Partner Offer card. 

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro membership on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro membership and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible.

Free Duolingo learners in the United States, who are learning from English to another language, are eligible for this promotion. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost membership? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Payment Info and Membership Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a membership plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro membership at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

NOTE: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error, that means that the Discord account you're trying to redeem this promotion on currently has a Nitro membership so it is ineligible for this Nitro promotion.

Please make sure you're logged into the account that you want to redeem this promotion on.

Q: I see a "Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub!" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Sorry, looks like you’ve already had a Nitro sub” error, that means that you've previously subscribed to Nitro on your Discord account and you won't be able to redeem this 1 month perk.

If you have never subscribed to Nitro, please submit a ticket through our support system: https://dis.gd/contact and our support team will be able to investigate further.

Be sure to include your full Discord ID and email address tied to your Discord account

Q: I see a "This gift has already been claimed" error when I try to claim my Nitro promo.

A: If you are seeing a "This gift has been claimed already" error, that means that the Nitro promo has already been used and cannot be used again. You may need to double check if you've claimed this promo on another Discord account.

Unfortunately, once the promo has been claimed, the promo cannot be re-enabled, and the Nitro cannot be transferred from one account to another.

Q: I see a "Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work." error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.

A: If you're seeing an “Wait a Second...Looks like this code didn't work.” error, that means that the promo is invalid.

Please note that our support team is unable to intervene if you are given an invalid promo and we will not be able to provide a new promo.

Q: I see a “Looks like something went wrong” error when I click on “Next”.

A: There are several reasons why you may be seeing this error:

  • You are ineligible for this promotion
  • The promotion is invalid
  • The promotion has reached the maximum number of claims
  • The link is invalid

Please note that the Discord support team is not able to assist if you run into this error when attempting to redeem. See the list above for possible reasons why your account may be ineligible or otherwise unable to redeem this promotion.

Q: I see a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you're seeing a "Sorry, This Payment Source Cannot Be Used for Redemption" error, that means that the payment method you've selected to cover the temporary $1 hold cannot be used for that purpose. 

Please keep in mind that prepaid payment methods, such as Gcash, cannot be used to cover temporary holds due to the nature of how prepaid payment methods function.

For more information on temporary holds, please check out this article!

Q: I see a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error when trying to redeem my promo!

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like this promotion has reached its maximum number of claims” error, that means the maximum limit for claims of this promotion has been reached and this promotion can no longer be claimed. If you have claimed this Nitro promotion, you are still able to redeem it to your Discord account!

Please note that the support team is unable to assist you if you run into this error and we are not able to increase the limit of claims.

Q: I see a “Looks like your email isn’t verified. Make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift.”

A: If you are seeing a “Looks like your email isn’t verified, make sure to verify your email before claiming this gift” error, you are trying to redeem this Nitro promotion on a Discord account with an email that hasn’t been verified yet.

You can check out this support article on how to resend the email verification for your Discord account. If you need help setting up your Discord account, you can read our Getting Started article. 

Q: I’m having trouble with this offer on my Duolingo account.

A: Please reach out to Duolingo’s support team by emailing super-support@duolingo.com. Be sure to include the subject line: “Nitro x Duolingo claim partner offer code” and describe the issue you’re experiencing.

articles.name: How To Enable Discord Language Filter
articles.title: How To Enable Discord Language Filter
articles.body:
What this article covers:

  • What is a Language Filter?
  • How to Enable/Disable the Language Filter
  • Frequently Asked Questions

This feature is currently an experiment and not available to all users.

What is a Language Filter?

The Language Filter allows you to hide certain words from messages you receive on Discord, now in DMs, GDMs, and in servers. This filter can help you reduce exposure to offensive or unwanted language, giving you a more comfortable experience on Discord. It works by redacting detected keywords with asterisks (****) from a pre-selected library of words. 

The filter is opt-in, and allows you to turn it on and off whenever you’d like. This filter only runs on your Discord client locally, meaning, this automatic filtering does not happen on Discord servers and Discord does not read your messages to power this filter. 

How to Enable/Disable the Language Filter

This feature is available on desktop, browser, and mobile.

1. To enable or disable this feature, tap on User Settings by selecting the cogwheel button [] in the bottom-left of the app. 

2. Navigate to the Privacy & Safety tab.

3. Scroll down until you see Enable language filter setting toggle. Press the toggle button to the right of this setting, you can enable or disable the setting.

  • Check mark means the setting is enabled
  • X means the setting is disabled

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Is Discord reading my messages with this filter?

A: No, Discord does not read your messages with the language filter. The filter works directly on your device, so your messages stay private and are not sent to Discord’s servers for filtering.

Q: What types of keywords are filtered?

A: The filter uses the same keyword list as Automod, which filters words from a preset list selected by Discord of commonly flagged words in the following categories:

  • Insults and Slurs: Personally insulting material, including terms that may be considered slurs or hate speech.
  • Sensitive Content: Sexually explicit language.
  • Severe Profanity: Egregious forms of profanity, while still allowing for mild forms of cursing or swearing.

Q: Can I add my own keywords to this list?

A: No, the filter is not customizable.

Q: Can I turn off or disable the language filter?

A: Yes, the filter is opt-in and can be enabled or disabled in the Privacy & Safety tab in your  User Settings at any time. This setting is disabled by default.

Q: Can I view the blocked word in the message without having to turn the filter off?

A: No, you will have to disable the filter to view blocked words.

Q: When will we support other languages besides English?

A: We’ll explore options for supporting other languages in future versions.

Q: Where will the filter work?

A: The filter works in DMs, GDMs (group messages), or in servers where server moderators have not enabled Automod.

Q: Will the language filter apply to all devices I use Discord on?

A: Yes, the filter setting will apply across all devices you use Discord on.

Q: What should I do if I find a word that should be filtered, but isn’t?

A: There is no way to provide feedback on specific requests, but we’ll continue to evolve the keyword list overtime.

articles.name: Moderating Apps on Discord
articles.title: Moderating Apps on Discord
articles.body:
What this article covers: 

  • What are apps?
  • How do apps become available in my server?
    • Apps in Your Server
    • External Apps
  • How do I moderate apps?
    • Use External Apps
    • Use Application Commands
    • Use Activities
    • Command Permissions
    • Bot Permissions
    • Automod
  • Permissions Chart

What are Apps?

Discord Apps add functionality, entertainment, and productivity tools to your servers, direct messages (DMs), and group chats. These apps can range from bots that automate tasks, to commands that give you quick access to useful and fun actions, to Activities that allow you to play games, collaborate on projects, or share experiences with others directly within Discord.

You can find more information on how to use apps on Discord here.

How do apps become available in my server?

Apps in Your Server

The Manage Server permission allows members to add apps to the server, making them available for everyone to use. Apps can be discovered in a number of places, including our App Directory.

You can find more information about adding and using apps here.

You can see a list of apps that have been added to your server by going to Server Settings > Integrations. You can also use the Integrations page to remove an app from your server.

When added to your server, apps are able to access certain data without specific permissions. You can see what data they have access to by navigating to their profile and going to Data Access. You can read more about data access in our article Visibility of Bot Data Access.

External Apps

Some apps are also available to users everywhere on Discord. By adding an app to your account, you can use it in all your servers, DMs, and group chats. These apps can be used in your server, but will not show up in Server Settings > Integrations, as they have not been added to your server.

Because these apps are not installed directly to your server, they don’t have permissions to do anything other than send messages, including attachments and embeds.

How do I moderate apps?

If you’re a server owner or moderator, you may want to moderate how your members use apps in your server. You have several controls at your disposal to set up your server in a way that works best for you and your community:

  • “Use External Apps” permission: control whether your server members can use their own apps.

    Note: The “Use External Apps” permission will be rolling out on June 18th, 2024. 

  • “Use Application Commands” permission: control who can use commands from apps.
  • “Use Activities” permission: control who can use Activities.
  • Command Permissions: control access to specific app commands from server-installed apps.
  • Bot Permissions: control server permissions for apps with bot users.
  • AutoMod: block keywords within messages sent by external apps.

To better understand how these permissions interact with each other, we’ve included a helpful chart located near the end of this article.

Use External Apps

Some apps are available to users everywhere on Discord. By adding an app to your account, you can use it in all your servers, DMs, and group chats. You can think of these apps as “external” to your server, compared to ones that have been added by you or your server moderators.

If you do not want members of your server to be able to use external apps, you can manage permissions by updating the “Use External Apps” permission. This permission can be changed for the whole server, specific channels, individual roles, and members.

Disabling the “Use External Apps” permission will prevent external apps from posting publicly  on your server. However, these apps can still be used; they will reply privately to the individual through an ephemeral message. This allows other Discord users to keep access to non-intrusive functionality that apps may offer, such as message translations, without being visible to other users.

Navigate to your Server Settings > Roles > Apps Permissions to locate the Use External Apps permission.

Use Application Commands

Commands are quick actions used to interact with apps, and can be accessed in a few ways:

  • Launching apps with the Shapes button
  • Typing / to see a list of slash commands
  • Right-clicking on users and messages

You can use the “Use Application Commands” permission to deny or grant members of your server the ability to use any commands from apps, whether they’re external or added to your server. This permission is available under Server Settings > Roles > Apps Permissions.

Disabling this permission will make commands from server apps completely inaccessible to your server members.

 Server members can still use commands from external apps, but these messages will only reply privately to the individual through an ephemeral message.

Use Activities

Activities allow you to enjoy shared experiences, such as games and media, with friends directly on Discord. 

Activities can be played inside both voice and text channels by selecting the Activities  [] icon or the Apps [] button. 

You can revoke the ability to use activities by disabling the “Use Activities” permission. Disabling this permission restricts activities from being used. Navigate to your Server Settings > Roles > Apps Permissions to locate the “Use Activities” permission.

 Learn more information regarding Activities in our Activities on Discord Help Center article.

Command Permissions

Permissions can be controlled for individual commands to give you granular control over apps added to your server. By default, commands from apps in your server are available to every member, in every channel. You may want to limit specific functionality  to your members, disallow other commands, or restrict them to members with specific roles.

 1. To locate the Command Permissions, head over to your Server Settings > Integrations. 

2. While there, select an app that’s been added to your server. 

3. Once selected, you can control:

  • Which roles and members can use the app
  • The channels in which the app can be used
  • Individual overrides for each command — where it can be used, and who can use it

      

Head over to our Command Permissions Help Center article for additional information and examples.

Bot Permissions

Certain apps, when added to your server, may request user permissions to perform specific actions such as:

  • Creating and editing channels
  • Sending messages, without command inputs 
  • Connecting to voice channels
  • Viewing the Audit Log

 When authorizing an app, you will be able to view the permissions needed..

If you ever want to change which permissions an app has within your server, you can go to Server Settings > Roles and search for the name of the app. You will see a role that you can then edit.

AutoMod

Discord’s AutoMod feature allows you to automatically scan, detect, and block unwanted and risky content before it’s ever posted. AutoMod will not scan or flag messages from apps that are installed to your server. It will only flag messages from external apps.

 Any actions taken by AutoMod will happen on the user who installed the application and first used it in a server. This means if an application creates a message with buttons, additional messages created from interacting with those buttons will also action against the user who first used the command.

 Learn more about AutoMod in our AutoMod FAQ.

Permissions Chart

As a server moderator, you have numerous controls available for moderating apps, securing your server’s safety, and customizing it to your liking. To simplify which permissions you can modify to achieve your desired setup, we’ve included this chart: 

I want members of my server to Use External Apps Use Application Commands Use Activities
Use all apps, their commands, and their Activities ✅ ✅ ✅
Use commands from external apps and apps in my server, but not their Activities ✅ ✅ ❌
Use commands and Activities from apps installed to the server, but not from external apps ❌ ✅ ✅
Use commands from server apps, but not external apps, and not use Activities ❌ ✅ ❌
Use Activities from server apps, but not external apps, and not use commands from any apps ❌ ❌ ✅
Not use apps ❌ ❌ ❌
Not use apps (by blocking commands and Activities) ✅ ❌ ❌

articles.name: Epic Games x Discord 2024 Promo
articles.title: Epic Games x Discord 2024 Promo
articles.body:
Starting from May 16, 2024 (11:00am EDT) to June 13, 2024 (11:00am EDT), Epic Game Store users can claim 1 month of Discord Nitro from the Epic Games Store. Learn below about how you can claim Discord Nitro.

Promotion Summary

Offer Details: 1 month of Discord Nitro

Who is Eligible: Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

We will not be able to refund any leftover membership time from those, and the user will be forfeiting the remainder of the existing membership when activating the 1 month Nitro trial.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Requirements: Claim through an email from the Epic Games Store by June 13, 2024 (11:00am EDT) and redeem in your Discord account by July 13, 2024 (11:59pm EDT).

Membership: After the 1 month trial period, your Nitro membership will convert to a monthly recurring membership, and Discord will bill your payment method for per month until you cancel it. You can cancel at any time in your Discord User Settings.

What this article covers:

  • What is Discord Nitro?
  • How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Epic Games Store account?  
  • How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account? 
    • Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial
    • Step by Step Redeem Instructions
      • What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 
  • Frequently Asked Questions
    • Promotion Details
    • Eligibility for the Promotion
    • Payment Info and Subscription Questions
    • Potential Errors and Other Issues

What is Discord Nitro?

Discord Nitro is our subscription plan that gives you access to special perks that’ll make your time on Discord as fun as ever! Personalize and enhance your experience with popular perks like HD streaming, 500MB file uploads, profile and avatar customizations, 2 free Server Boosts, and more:

  • Custom Emojis
  • Discord App Color Themes
  • Super Reactions
  • Avatar Decorations
  • Unique Server Profiles
  • Server Boosts
  • More Nitro & Nitro Basic perks

How do I claim the Nitro Promo from my Epic Games Store account?  

In order to claim this Nitro trial promotion, you must have an Epic Games Store account.

1. Head over to the Epic Game Store app from May 16, 2024 (11:00am EDT) to June 13, 2024 (11:00am EDT) and you should see the Nitro trial promotion on the homepage. 

2. Press on the promotion to get started on redeeming Nitro.

3. Then, check your email tied to your Epic Games Store account to find an email from the Epic Games Store about this promotion. Try searching for "Nitro" in your email inbox!

Please make sure the email address associated with your Epic Games Store account is current and correct! Allow for up to 24 hours for email delivery and check your spam folder.

4. Once you have found the email, follow the prompts to claim the Nitro trial and you'll be automatically redirected to a browser window to redeem the promotion.

The unique promotion link will look like this: https://discord.com/billing/promotions/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

How do I redeem the Nitro Trial on my Discord Account?

Once you have claimed the promo link, you'll now need to officially redeem this promo link on your Discord account (or share this code with a friend). You must redeem this Nitro trial by July 13, 2024 (11:59pm EDT).

Eligibility for Redeeming the Nitro Trial

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Users who have had an active Nitro membership or Nitro trial in the last 12 months are not eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Users who have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on their accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If a user has had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on their account and they’ve never had a Nitro membership, redeeming this promotion will override that membership.

Users who have already claimed a gift from this promotion are not eligible to claim further gifts from this promotion.

Step by Step Redeem Instructions

If you're eligible and ready to redeem this Nitro membership on your own Discord account, you can follow these steps below to redeem the promo.

NOTE:
- Before redeeming Nitro, make sure you are logged in your own Discord account.
- If you accidentally redeemed the Nitro promo on an account that is not yours, we are unable to provide you with another promo.

Step 1 - Pressing the Promo Link/Copy and Pasting into your Browser Window

Start by directly pressing the promotion link or right clicking the link to copy and paste the link into your browser window.

Note:If you're redeeming this Nitro promo link in the Discord Gift Inventory, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX

Step 2 - Logging into Discord

If you're not already logged into Discord in your browser, you will then be automatically redirected to either:

Register for a New Account

If you don't have an account, you can directly register a new Discord account

Login to your Account

If you already have a Discord account, you can login to your account using your email and password or using QR code login

Step 3 - Confirming the Correct Account and Payment Method

Once you have logged into your Discord account, you'll see a new message asking you to confirm that you are accepting the Nitro subscription on the correct Discord account.

  • You'll see a notice saying: "You are accepting this gift as _________" 

If your Discord account does not have your payment information, you'll be asked to fill out your payment details. (Note: You will not be charged until the free trial ends and the subscription renews)

When you've filled out all the necessary information and you're ready to redeem this promotion, press the "Accept Gift" button.

Note: If you're logged into the incorrect Discord account, press the "Wrong account" button to login to the other account.

Step 4 - Membership Now Activated

After accepting the promo to your account, you'll now be automatically redirected to your Subscriptions tab in your User Settings to see your newly activated Nitro membership on your account.

What if I am an Active Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting Member? 

Just to clarify - if you have had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your account and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

So long as you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership, you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

How do I share my Code with a Friend?

If you're unable to redeem the Nitro subscription link, you can share this link with a friend to use instead.

After you find the email from the Epic Games Store with the promotion link, you can directly copy the promotion link and send it to a friend. We recommend sending the link in a private direct message. Make sure your friend redeems the code by July 13, 2024 (11:59pm EDT).

Frequently Asked Questions

We know there's a lot of information to unpack on this promotion above, so we've also broken down this information in this FAQ section as well too.

  • Promotion Details
  • Eligibility for the Promotion
  • Payment Info and Membership Questions
  • Potential Errors and Other Issues
    • Already Had/Have Nitro
    • Already Redeemed
    • Something's Wrong Here

Promotion Details

Q: How long does this promotion run for?

A: Epic Games Store users can claim Discord Nitro promo between May 16, 2024 (11:00am EDT) to June 13, 2024 (11:00am EDT).

After July 13, 2024 (11:59pm EDT), Epic Game Store users will no longer be able to claim a trial promo.

Q: How long does the Discord Nitro promotion last for?

A: You must redeem the Nitro promotion by July 13, 2024 (11:59pm EDT).

If a code has not been redeemed to the Discord account by  July 13, 2024 (11:59pm EDT) it will expire and you will no longer be able to have 1 month of Discord Nitro.

Eligibility for the Promotion

Q: Who can claim this promotion?

A: You must have an Epic Games Store account to claim this promotion through an email sent from the Epic Games Store to your email associated with your Epic Games Store account.

Q: Who can redeem this Nitro trial to their Discord account?

A: Users who have never had an active Nitro membership on their Discord accounts are eligible to redeem this Nitro promotion.

Additionally, users who previously had a Discord Nitro membership and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months are ineligible.

This promotion is only available in certain regions. If you receive an "Unknown Gift Code" error during the claim/redemption process, you are not eligible to redeem this promotion. You can learn more at this Help Center article.

Q: What if I'm a current or previous Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or a Server Boost membership? Can I also take part in this promotion? 

A: If you previously had a Discord Nitro membership at any point on your accounts and have had a Nitro Classic or Nitro Basic membership in the past 12 months, you are ineligible to redeem this promotion.

If you have had a Nitro Basic, Nitro Classic, or Server Boosting membership active on your account and you’ve never had a Nitro membership,  you will be able to redeem this promotion and replace it with the 1 month Nitro membership.

HOWEVER, please note: By choosing to activate this 1 month trial, you will lose any features associated with your current memberships, and **you will not receive a refund for any remaining value on your current membership**.

At the end of the promotion period, you'll be converted to a paying Nitro membership per month unless you cancel your membership.

Payment Info and Membership Questions

Q: Why do I need to submit my payment info to redeem Nitro?

A: Because Nitro is a membership plan, at the end of your 1 month trial, we will start your first billing cycle so you can continue to enjoy Nitro on Discord.

However, you can cancel the Nitro membership at any time before the end of the 1 month.

Q: Why do I see a temporary hold/charge on my account when this is supposed to be a free promotion?

A: Just to clarify, this Nitro promotion is free, however, there will be a temporary hold placed on the payment method upon activating the promotion. This is to help Discord confirm the payment method works as expected and to prevent the use of fraudulent payment methods. This charge will appear in your Discord transaction history, and it may appear as a hold on your payment method.

We immediately reverse the temporary hold, and you’ll see that reflected in your Discord transaction history. Your bank may take longer to remove the hold from your payment method.

Note: Banks will usually remove the temporary hold from your account within a few business days.

If your Discord transaction history does not show the hold released after 5 business days, please let us know at https://dis.gd/contact, and our support team will be able to investigate this issue further.

Potential Errors and Other Issues

Q: What if I didn't receive an email from Epic Games Store with the Nitro promo link, even if I have an Epic Games Store account?

A: In order to receive an email from Epic Games Store with the Nitro promo link, you must have an Epic Games Store account.

Additionally, make sure that you've opted to receive marketing emails from the Epic Games Store. If you've unsubscribed, you sadly won't be able to see this offer. 

If you believe you are eligible for the promotion, contact Epic Games Store's support team: https://www.epicgames.com/help/en-US/

Q: I see a Sad Trombone error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo link.

A: Would you happen to be entering this Nitro promo link from the promotion into the Discord Gift Inventory or as a link within Discord chat?

If so, this is the incorrect method for redeeming the Nitro promo link, and you will see an error when attempting to redeem the promotion.

In order to successfully claim this promotion, enter only your unique 24-digit code from the Nitro promotion link in the following format: XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

Q: I see a "Oh no! It looks like you have Nitro already" error when I try to redeem my Nitro promo.
